examples.statistical_analysis¶

Statistical analysis

1/ Matrix factorization of MALDI datacube 2/ Projection of the MRI in the space defined

by the axes of the dimension reduction method
3/ Sort the MALDI images by ascending order of
the Euclidean distance between the MALDI image and the MRI image in this reduced space
